title: Inclusive Stakeholding and Redefining Health
itunes:title: Inclusive Stakeholding and Redefining Health
description:
Dr. Joon Yun, President of Palo Alto Investors, discusses examining the underlying causes of health and aging. He also explains the importance of "inclusive stakeholding" to reimagine new types of social, political and economic institutions for the global village.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
